FlatSequence Properties

Requires: VI Scripting

View the class hierarchy.

PropertyDescription
AutoSize To Fit Contents?Sets or returns whether the Flat Sequence structure automatically resizes to fit its contents. Details
Breakpoint StatusSets or returns the status of a breakpoint on a Flat Sequence structure. Details
DescriptionSets or returns the description string for the Flat Sequence structure. Details
Frames[]Returns an array of references to the frames of the Flat Sequence structure. Details
LabelReferences the label of the Flat Sequence structure. Details
Subdiagram Label VisibleSets the visibility of the subdiagram label. Details
Terminals[]Returns an array of references to the terminals of the Flat Sequence structure. Details
